# hotspotSSID

**Instance Property**

The Wi-Fi hotspot SSID of the accessory to migrate.

## Declaration

```swift
var hotspotSSID: String? { get set }
```

## Accessory identifiers

- **peripheralIdentifier**: The Bluetooth identifier of the accessory to migrate.
- **wifiAwarePairedDeviceID**: The Wi-Fi Aware paired device identififer of the accessory to migrate.
